message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can't have it all, take a small share!
I'll give you a bigger share, but still keep some for myself
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you a bigger chunk, but don't expect me to be generous
You're running out of time, I'm not getting desperate yet!
I'll give you a small mercy, but don't think I'm going soft
You're getting close to losing everything, don't expect sympathy!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but don't think I'm showing weakness
You're almost out of time, don't make me have to take it all!
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but I'm not going down without a fight
You're running out of options, take this or leave it!
